text: The Pocking Solar Park is a 10-megawatt (MWp) solar photovoltaic plant which is among the largest in the world. Construction of the power plant started in August 2005 and was completed in March 2006. On the former military training area in the Lower-Bavarian town of Pocking, sheep are now grazing under and around the 57,912 photovoltaic modules. ==Related pages== * Photovoltaics * Renewable energy * Solar cell * Solar power station in Victoria * Waldpolenz Solar Park in Germany ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Bavaria Category:Power stations in Germany Category:Solar power plants
title: Pocking Solar Park in Germany
